name: Ecosystem Simulator (Hedster)
description: An ecosystem simulator using AI to simulate ecosystems in the nature. There are 9 different animals that will interact with eachother. Elephants, Cheetahs, Lions, Giraffes, Gazelles, Hyenas, Wildebeests, Zebras and rhinos will roam around and try to survive by either eating grass or killing other animals. They will try to find water, food and reproduce. There are also genetics that will play a part of the animals lifetime.
